author: gcolvin
content:
I left this comment at the EIP-5450 "discussions to" thread  https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-5450-eof-stack-validation/10410/9 but it's been dead for years.  So....

In the https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-5450 motivation you state that

> Single pass transpilation passes can be safely executed with the code validation and advanced stack/register handling can be applied with the stack height validations.

But I don’t see that the invariants given in the “Properties of validated code” section actually prove these.  It's also not clear what the single-pass algorithms are.
<@275684146658148352>
